title: Interpret
text: The independent variable is the $$x$$. Interpret what $$x$$ could be?

title: Coefficient
text: What number is in front of the $$x$$ in $$y=25+20x$$?
What number is in front of the x in $$y=25+20x$$?

title: Meaning
text: The 20 represents the cost per hour of work. Therefore, $$x$$ would represent this cost.
